#include <stdio.h>
#include <stdlib.h>
int cmpfunc (const void * a1, const void * b)
{
   return ( *(int*)a1 - *(int*)b );
}
int main(void) {
	// your code goes here
	int t,n,i,j;
	int a[500];
	scanf("%d",&t);
	while(t--)
	{
	    scanf("%d",&n);
	    for(i=0;i<n;i++)
	    scanf("%d",&a[i]);
	    
	
	 qsort(a, n, sizeof(int), cmpfunc);
	 for(i=0,j=n-1;i<=j;i++,j--)
	 {
	     if(i==j)
	     printf("%d",a[i]);
	     else
	    
	     printf("%d %d ",a[j],a[i]);
	 }
	 printf("\n");
	}
	return 0;
}
